school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She gets mad when you ask something you didn\'t understand. Can be a b. Assumes you have to know everything.

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: really confusing at most of the time

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Andrea is a great person and teacher, but keep in mind that if you respect her and respect the work that you do in her class she will respect you. Be ambitious on your projects and put in the effort to make it work, she may not say she likes it to your face and she won\'t tell you what to do but if you show up on time and do your best she notices.

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Great Teacher! Always checks in with students to make sure they know what is going on. Not the easiest teacher but she challenges you in expanding your 3-D creativity! This is my favorite class!

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She has her highs and lows, she\'s extremely helpful, but she loses her patience with certain students, soft spoken. Attendance is a must in her class. Sometimes she can be unclear but she always ends with "does that make sense" to make sure everyone understands. she loves ambitious projects . hates the simple ones.Be prepared to spend a lot of cash

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I\'m surprised by the other comments here. I found Andrea to be both personable and knowledgeable. She allows plenty of artistic freedom, but expects you to follow directions and stick to deadlines religiously. Maybe her feedback isn\'t always the best, but she is very involved with her students and obviously want the best for them.

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Very weak teacher. Does not like when kids are too ambitious with their projects. During a critique she\'ll say all sorts of sweet things to your face but when it comes to evaluations you\'ll see the total opposite come out. I didn\'t learn anything. She\'s a waste of time--and money.

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had her for 3D Body and Place during foundation year. She barely teaches and feedback can be weak. The class assignments were alright but I felt like I could\'ve learned a lot more if I was with another professor

school_name: Parsons The New School For Design
tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She was really nice to everyone and helpful. She really likes it when you stick to the directions rather than going off into doing something more imaginative and creative. Rather than being abstract she likes it when you put all of your effort into projects. graded mostly by all the work you put into projects.
